headline: Best moves for your portfolio: Buy Ulta Beauty, avoid Arista
summary: Zacks Investment Management senior client portfolio manager Brian Mulberry joins Asking for a Trend host Josh Lipton on Good Buy or Goodbye to explain why he is bullish on Ulta Beauty (ULTA) and bearish on Arista Networks (ANET). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Inflation, Earnings and Other Key Things to Watch this Week
summary: Markets face a critical week featuring an unusual mid-week jobs report Wednesday at 8:30am alongside Friday's January CPI data, creating a compressed economic data schedule that will test whether recent inflation concerns are justified or if price pressures are finally moderating.

headline: Arista Networks Deepens Role In AI Data Centers And Valuation Debate
summary: Arista Networks (NYSE:ANET) is expanding its role in AI data center networking as major cloud customers adopt its ultra fast Ethernet switches for next generation AI cluster networks. The company has updated its Cognitive Campus platform and introduced Arista VESPA, aimed at supporting large scale WLAN mobility within enterprise and data center environments. These product moves align Arista more closely with ongoing AI infrastructure build outs at hyperscale data centers operated by global...
